CustomField.formula:
IF ( Account.ShippingState = 'California' || Account.ShippingState = 'Oregon' || Account.ShippingState = 'Washington' || Account.ShippingState = 'Nevada' || Account.ShippingState = 'Idaho' || Account.ShippingState = 'Utah' || Account.ShippingState = 'Arizona' || Account.ShippingState = 'Montana' || Account.ShippingState = 'Alaska' || Account.ShippingState = 'Hawaii', 'West',
IF ( Account.ShippingState = 'Wyoming' || Account.ShippingState = 'Colorado' || Account.ShippingState = 'New Mexico' || Account.ShippingState = 'North Dakota' || Account.ShippingState = 'South Dakota' || Account.ShippingState = 'Nebraska' || Account.ShippingState = 'Kansas' || Account.ShippingState = 'Oklahoma' || Account.ShippingState = 'Texas' || Account.ShippingState = 'Minnesota' || Account.ShippingState = 'Iowa' || Account.ShippingState = 'Missouri' || Account.ShippingState = 'Arkansas' || Account.ShippingState = 'Louisiana' || Account.ShippingState = 'Wisconsin' || Account.ShippingState = 'Illinois' || Account.ShippingState = 'Mississippi' , 'Central',
IF ( Account.ShippingState = 'Michigan' || Account.ShippingState = 'Indiana' || Account.ShippingState = 'Kentucky' || Account.ShippingState = 'Tennessee' || Account.ShippingState = 'Alabama' || Account.ShippingState = 'Ohio' || Account.ShippingState = 'Georgia' || Account.ShippingState = 'Florida' || Account.ShippingState = 'South Carolina' || Account.ShippingState = 'North Carolina' || Account.ShippingState = 'Virginia' || Account.ShippingState = 'West Virginia' || Account.ShippingState = 'Delaware' || Account.ShippingState = 'Maryland' || Account.ShippingState = 'New Jersey' || Account.ShippingState = 'Pennsylvania' || Account.ShippingState = 'New York' || Account.ShippingState = 'Connecticut' || Account.ShippingState = 'Rhode Island' || Account.ShippingState = 'Massachusetts' || Account.ShippingState = 'Vermont' || Account.ShippingState = 'New Hampshire' || Account.ShippingState = 'Maine' , 'East',
"")))
CustomField.label: State region
